divs: Sighting Details,1 ahead 2 in back making a triangle... than 5 to 6 one behind the other heading after the first 3 towards soundless lightning.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York

Summary: Amazing 3 in Pyrimad form 5 loose towards lightning..
